entries.text: The cat's tails twitch with a glitchy rhythm as Boots looks up at Boo G, eyes blinking out of sync. A sly grin creeps across the feline's face. Meow? The paths are many, but the cat always lands on its feet. Your luck may hold for now, but the cosmic game is ever-changing. This one's streak will not last.
